title: A Disturbance in Time?
description: 1668 – In an isolated community in the wilds of Exmoor, a poor peasant family is terrorized by a crazed witchfinder. 1989 – The crew of HMS Leopard welcome on board two distraught young girls, the survivors of a shipwreck off the coast of East Africa.2004 – Three geeky lads build an experimental computer in their summer holidays and end up with much more than they bargained on.Three apparently unconnected events and places but all bound together across time, and in the control of a mysterious power that is seemingly beyond good and evil …
author: Ron Jayes
